alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:06AM CST until February 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Stutsman County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM this morning to Midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous wind chills could return Tuesday night, and likely remain through the end of the week.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
